name: Fog and Sea
description:
DESCRIPTION

You're from a world where the dead don't move on, they move out. Ghosts live in cities built on the backs of huge creatures. There's a process before you move where you get to choose where you end up, spend 3 days getting to know your perspective new neighbourhoods (and maybe a little more) before you settle into the afterlife.

This was for Mini Jam 81, the theme is Kaiju so naturally my mind went to making a dating sim. The limitation was Death isn't the end.

oh and if u have any thoughts abt the game u can also tweet them at me at @unseconds, im p active there 

CONTROLS

WASD and arrow keys for movement, any keys to get through the credit screens

just walk into the creatures in the map to start their dialog, if you cant interact with one try the other. Also space bar to move through text.
